item.title: This is my First Post
item.content:encoded:
Yeah, this is my first time using Astro+TinaCMS. i think it will hard because i donâ€™t know much about Javascript but after a few days i look at documentation, tutorial and asking to AI (ChatGPT and Gemini) i think i know how it works.
